name: commits_by_author
description: The number of commits made by each author in the repository.

dimensions.name: author_name
dimensions.description: The name of the author of the commit.

measures.name: commit_count
measures.description: The total number of commits made by the author.

sample_questions: Who has made the most commits?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT oid, author__name AS author_name FROM commits.commits
